name: End of Edge
description:
No matter how skilled you are, a single strike is all it takes to bring about your demise! End of Edge, developed by LIGHTSPEED STUDIOS, is an adrenaline-pumping Wuxia-themed action game that will put your abilities to the test. Fight against overwhelming odds in this exhilarating over-the-top show of martial arts combat, where a single hit can mean life or death.

[Hardcore Action] With every breath held, a well-executed slash is your path to victory.

[Diverse Weapons] Embrace your unique fighting style for maximum enjoyment.

[Authentic Wuxia Adventure] Immerse yourself in a captivating story that unfolds amidst the ever-changing tides of destiny.

[Retro Aesthetic] Experience a simplified narrative that places classic Wuxia elements at its core.

[Fusion Style Sound Design] Indulge in the fusion of Chinese electronic music and traditional sounds.
